description: An adversary might use WMI to list Processes running on the compromised host or list installed Software hotfix and patches. Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious WMI Reconnaissance
query: ((process.executable:*\\WMIC.exe AND process.command_line:(*process* OR *qfe*)) AND (NOT (process.command_line:*call* AND process.command_line:*create*)))
